A Gym for the Soul - Therapeutic wisdom for emotionally Intelligent living. Begin your journey of self-discovery. We take the best of therapeutic wisdom, ancient philosophy and coaching theory and package them into innovative self-development journeys. With masterclass videos, guided meditations, workbooks and live webinars, our expert led programs will help you integrate wisdom into everyday high-performance living. Whether you want to explore your relationship dynamics, understand your family programming, or break through to a new level of inner freedom, Awake helps you move to the next level of your personal growth journey. Learn the tools and principles therapists & coaches use, so that you can begin your journey of self-discovery now! Enlightened personal growth, supported by experts Gym for the Soul Learn your self
